pageContext.claim: “‘They say Roger Stone lied to Congress.’ @CNN  OH, I see, but so did Comey (and he also leaked classified information, for which almost everyone, other than Crooked Hillary Clinton, goes to jail for a long time), and so did Andy McCabe, who also lied to the FBI! FAIRNESS?”
pageContext.analysis: A jury convicted Stone after a trial. He faced seven counts of lying to Congress, obstructing a federal investigation and tampering with a witness. Trump often falsely accuses James Comey of leaking classified documents, but an investigation by the Justice Department inspector general cleared Comey of that allegation. It's not clear what Trump means with "forged documents," but none of the people he mentioned were accused of forgery.
